transcript: the next time someone you work with says I'll get itchy by end of week just slap them or just say that doesn't work for me because it might come at least we say  end of week instead end of day is better if you make the default in your business that end of day becomes the new end of week you move seven times faster as a company which is crazy because if you need to do a project and someone turns it around a week and then they turn the next thing around a week the next person turns around a week what took 21 days can take three days in your business the opportunity cost of how much more every single project starting earlier would have made you that compounds is what creates breathtaking growth
